data.actual_result: Entry does not show what permissions were granted/denied
data.expected_result: Entry shows what permissions were granted/denied
data.short_description: Granting/denying permissions to a role doesn't show what permissions were granted/denied
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage roles and view the audit log - Grant/deny permissions to a role - Go into the audit log and view the entry
